name: Attendace Report
query:
select 
employee as "ID:Link/Employee:100",
employee_name as "Employee Name:Data:200" , 
status "Status:Data:100",

department as "Department:Data:100", 
shift as "Shift:Data:100", 
in_time as "In Time:Data:200", 
out_time as "Out Time:Data:200",
hourse  as "Working Hours:Data:200",

from `tabAttendance`

where attendance_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
